General.Name: Xingguang Agricultural Mach
General.Description: Thinker Agricultural Machinery Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, sale, and service of agricultural machinery in China. The company's products include grain harvesting, grain crop harvesting, grain processing, power, and forage harvesting machinery. Thinker Agricultural Machinery Co., Ltd. was founded in 2004 and is based in Huzhou, China.
